name: Initium (Jenceslav, lioh, Hesik)
description:
INITIUM = FROM THE BEGINNING

Every phoenix is bound to a live an endless cycle of life and death. You have to take it on yourself to choose where that cycle is happening.

A flame engulfed rogue-lite action platformer CONTROLS: KEYBOARD:

WSAD - movement

K- attack

L - dash

CONTROLLER: 

joystick - movement

X- attack

A / B - jump

Y - interact

LT - dash

Follow us on Twitter and check out our other games on Itch!
